message: Take it or leave it, Bob! You'll get a better offer next round, but you might not like the consequences.
A slight adjustment to the previous offer, Alice. Let's meet in the middle.
You're getting closer, Bob. Don't think you can outsmart me!
Alice, I'm not giving up yet. I'll try to get a better deal.
You're running out of time, Bob. Don't expect any more favors from me!
Alice, I'm not backing down. I'll keep pushing for a better deal.
You're getting desperate, Bob. Better take it before I change my mind!
Alice, I'm not giving up yet. I'll try to get a better deal before it's too late.
